summary: Update TypeScript SDK Connection to eagerly connect with getSystemInfo RPC call. Make Connection constructor private and add async Connection.create() factory method. Update WorkflowClient to require a Connection instance and add WorkflowClient.forLocalHost() helper.
userImpact: Users will need to use async factory methods to create connections and clients, enabling proper system info discovery and metadata/timeout handling.
proposedFix: Make Connection.create() an async factory, make Connection constructor private, require Connection in WorkflowClient constructor, add WorkflowClient.forLocalHost() helper, and expose connection via client.connection property.
resolutionDetails: Feature was implemented as requested with Connection.create() factory and WorkflowClient updates.
keyQuote: Connection constructor will become private and instead we'll expose an async factory: Connection.create().
